data: As Mrs. Shillaber often said, the one good thing about her old house was the fact that “you could throw the dining-room into the poller” when you wanted to give parties or funerals or weddings or such things.

As Mrs. Shillaber often said, the one good thing about her old house was the fact that "you could throw the dining-room into the poller" when you wanted to give parties or funerals or weddings or such things.
